name: Finding Apples
description:
Can you recognize Apples among many fruits? Can you find all Apples in the screen? Let's try and enjoy it.

- Hint: quantity of apples in a round is similar to equivelant level.
- Reach the high score, compete with other players around the world.

- Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/khanglbtk
- Visit my website: http://khangle.me
